import classes from './CartItem.module.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import cartActions from '../../store/cart-slice' const CartItem = (props) => { const { title, quantity, total, price, id } = props.item const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(cartActions) const addItemHandler = () => {} const removeHandler = () => {} return (

  • {title}

    ${total.toFixed(2)}{' '} (${price.toFixed(2)}/item)
    x {quantity}
    • ) } export default CartItem
